mapper.select: SELECT count(*) FROM ts_scheduled_task WHERE job_schedule_id=#{jobScheduleId}
SELECT * FROM ts_scheduled_task WHERE job_schedule_id=#{jobScheduleId} ORDER BY create_time DESC LIMIT #{rowNo}, #{pageSize}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ts_scheduled_task(job_schedule_id, data, client_ip, status, create_time, start_time) VALUES (#{jobScheduleId}, #{data}, #{clientIp}, #{status}, NOW(), NOW())
mapper.update: UPDATE ts_scheduled_task SET status=1, client_ip=#{clientIp}, start_time=now() WHERE id=#{id} AND status=0
UPDATE ts_scheduled_task SET status=3, end_time=now() WHERE id=#{id}
UPDATE ts_scheduled_task SET status=4, error_message=#{errorMessage}, end_time=now() WHERE id=#{id}
